page.title: 13SHOPPING IN BAYSTON HILL
page.content: The main shopping area in Bayston Hill is situated in Landsdowne Road. The parade has a good selection of shops selling a great variety of goods:_ newspapers,post office,sweets, D.I.Y.,chemist,Estate Agents, Bakers, Wine shop, Super Market, Pet Shop, Greengrocers, Hair dresses,and Chip shop. There is also a general store and Butchers in Overdale Road. People were asked how much use they made of the shops in Bayston Hill. The general impression is that most people only use them in emergencies and the bulk of their shopping is done in the Shrewsbury Supermarkets. Their reasons are because of cost. Goods in Bayston Hill are considerably more expensive than in Shrewsbury. House wives in full time employment make more use of the local shops as they find them convenient and they save time.
